message.body: Dad I'm doing this genealogy project for history-- were either or your grandfathers in wwii? And if so what were their names?

Jenna hm... I think so.. aunt heidi is a great source for this gamma too: on gampas side joseph Yonker and joseph artim. on gammas side elmer mauger (old world german spelling Maucher with two dots over the a) and Mcguire (do not remember first name).. Gottlieb Maucher (mauger) was in the civil war fought for the north and was caught and held in libby prison... A famous prison.... You could call Gamma.... and It would make her day
Did u call gamma or heidi?
No just got out of class. I'll see if I have time tomorrow

Ok but it is only 8 00 there... if you call tomorrow just know that she has been taking and picking up tristan to and from school. gretas car is broken. they are 1 hour behind us. heidi would have the most info though i am sure...
jenna r u home safe? Hey you have money in the WF account.... Love you.
Ok.... How gettimg back to dorm? shuttle?
Yeah or safe ride. Don't have shoes.
Well I didn't cuz the Rain got worse so moms looking online for me right now
